---
name: make-skill-template
description: Scaffolds new repository-aligned skills.
---

# Make Skill Template

Use this skill to create new skills that fit this workshop repository.

## Required Output

- `SKILL.md` with purpose, triggers, inputs, outputs, and constraints
- Optional `references/` files for checklists or examples
- Examples that reference real repo paths

## Workshop Constraints

- Preserve facilitator/participant audience separation
- Avoid non-existent repo assumptions
- Keep instructions concise and testable
